name: Snowthrow Champion
description:
Take a trip to a picturesque, snowy mountain fairground with an old-fashioned charm. But don’t let the quaint atmosphere and old-fangled technology fool you, these people take their game seriously. 

It’s the start of the annual Snowball Throwing Gallery competition, a centuries-old tradition, and the converted title of Grand Snowball Tosser has never been held by an outsider. 

Do you think that you have the reflexes, accuracy and nerve required to aim true, throw straight and take the top spot?

https://www.coregames.com/games/e2b1b4/snowthrow-champion

--

Developed for the "GGJ + Core Holiday Jam", December 2020 - for the theme "Winter Wonderland".

This is my first 3D game and first game created using the Core game engine.

Controls
  • Left mouse button to throw the snowballs
Movement
  • 'w' - Forwards
  • 'a' - Strafe left
  • 's' - Backwards
  • 'd' - Strafe right

Move the mouse to move the camera and the direction the character is facing.

Credits
  • Level design, asset creation (kitbashing) & programming - SteveJaxon
Core Community Content Used

I created most of the in-game items myself, but there were a few items that came from the community content marketplace.
